Sentencas: Recently, there has been a growing interest in developing ultra-fine nanostructured electrodes with extensive reaction areas for improved performance and low-temperature operation of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: High-performance low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell with nanostructured lanthanum strontium cobaltite/yttria-stabilized zirconia cathode via advanced co-sputtering

Sentencas: Recent advancements using a refined approach of co-sputtering metal alloys and oxide targets have shown the feasibility of nano-columnar structures of perovskite-based electrodes.
Titulo: High-performance low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell with nanostructured lanthanum strontium cobaltite/yttria-stabilized zirconia cathode via advanced co-sputtering

Sentencas: This achievement notably expands the operating temperature range for thin film electrodes.
Titulo: High-performance low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell with nanostructured lanthanum strontium cobaltite/yttria-stabilized zirconia cathode via advanced co-sputtering

Sentencas: In this study, we systematically examine the effects of chamber pressure control in the co-sputtering process using LSC perovskite oxide and YZr metal-alloy targets, targeting cathode application in all-sputtered SOFCs.
Titulo: High-performance low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell with nanostructured lanthanum strontium cobaltite/yttria-stabilized zirconia cathode via advanced co-sputtering

Sentencas: We focus on variations in columnar shape, particle size, and electrochemical performance.
Titulo: High-performance low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell with nanostructured lanthanum strontium cobaltite/yttria-stabilized zirconia cathode via advanced co-sputtering

Sentencas: Contrary to conventional sputtering methods, our research identifies that the relationship between sputtering pressure and the film structure is significantly complicated.
Titulo: High-performance low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell with nanostructured lanthanum strontium cobaltite/yttria-stabilized zirconia cathode via advanced co-sputtering

Sentencas: Notably, the growth characteristics of metal alloys and the oxide materials diverge, leading to intricate structural changes under the process conditions.
Titulo: High-performance low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell with nanostructured lanthanum strontium cobaltite/yttria-stabilized zirconia cathode via advanced co-sputtering

Sentencas: We observe substantial enhancements of performance and thermo-mechanical properties by fine-tuning columnar growth in the electrode, resulting in a high performance of 580 mW/cm2 in all-sputtered SOFCs at 500 degrees C.
Titulo: High-performance low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell with nanostructured lanthanum strontium cobaltite/yttria-stabilized zirconia cathode via advanced co-sputtering
